thread.title: Reports: Derek Fisher, Matt Barnes had backyard altercation
thread.title_full: Reports: Derek Fisher, Matt Barnes had backyard altercation

title: Reports: Derek Fisher, Matt Barnes had backyard altercation
text:
Matt Barnes and New York Knicks coach Derek Fisher reportedly were in an altercation over the weekend. (Photo: Kirby Lee-USA TODAY Sports)
36 CONNECT 34 TWEET LINKEDIN 1 COMMENT EMAIL MORE New York Knicks coach Derek Fisher and Memphis Grizzzlies forward Matt Barnes had a confrontation at the home of Barnes' ex-wife over the weekend, according to reports by the New York Post and Yahoo!
According to the reports, Fisher has been in a relationship with Gloria Govan, who is one of the stars of "Basketball Wives LA". Fisher was at Govan's house in Los Angeles and Barnes drove down from Grizzlies camp in nearby Santa Barbara and the two had an altercation in the back yard.
USA TODAY
NBA A to Z podcast: Kobe returns to Lakers
The Memphis Grizzlies released a statement Wednesday evening that said, "We are aware and currently gathering information regarding todayâ€™s report involving Matt Barnes. We have no further comment at this time."
Barnes and Fisher were teammates on the Lakers from 2010-12.
